mapper.select: select * from meal where memberCode = ${memberCode} and to_date(mealDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') between to_date(#{today},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
select * from meal where memberCode = ${memberCode} and to_date(mealDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') between to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.delete: delete from meal where memberCode=${memberCode} and mealDate=#{mealDate} and timeCode=${timeCode} and meal=#{meal}
mapper.update: update meal set mealDate=#{modDate}, timeCode=${modTime} where memberCode=${mealDTO.memberCode} and mealDate=#{mealDTO.mealDate} and timeCode=${mealDTO.timeCode} and meal=#{mealDTO.meal}
